front.title: The keyed-hash message authentication code (HMAC)

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.)
National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.)

front.abstract: This Standard describes a keyed-hash message authentication code (HMAC), a mechanism for message authentication using cryptographic hash functions. HMAC can be used with any iterative Approved cryptographic hash function, in combination with a shared secret key. [Supersedes FIPS 198 (March 2002)]
